meanings.definition: A small, hardy horse of the North American plains, descended from horses brought by the Spanish.
meanings.sent1: The mustangs ran freely across the open prairie.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy watching mustangs gallop in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The mustangs decided to have a race with the zebras for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as wild and untamed as a herd of mustangs.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the mustangs kicking up dust was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A high-performance version of the Ford Mustang, a popular American sports car.
meanings.sent1: He dreamed of owning one of the powerful mustangs.
meanings.sent2: The mustangs at the car show attracted a lot of attention.
meanings.sent3: The mustangs lined up at the traffic light, ready to show off their speed.
meanings.sent4: The roar of the mustangs echoed through the streets like thunder.
meanings.sent5: Driving a mustang felt like flying on the road.
